HTMLInputElementMax.summary: The max property of the interface reflects the {{HTMLElement("input")}} element's max attribute, which generally defines the maximum valid value for a numeric or date-time input. If the attribute is not explicitly set, the max property is an empty string.

remarks.para:
-input of type input/range, input/number, input/date, input/month, input/week, and input/time
-
-
-

HTMLInputElementMax.value: A string representing the element's max value or an empty string if no max is explicitly set.
